alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; Rice; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 1:53AM CDT until April 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTHWESTERN RICE...ELLSWORTH... SOUTHEASTERN RUSSELL AND EASTERN BARTON COUNTIES... At 153 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Kanopolis to near Ellinwood, moving east-northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Great Bend, Ellsworth, Hoisington, Ellinwood, Claflin, Kanopolis, Chase, Holyrood, Bushton, Geneseo, Lorraine, Frederick, Westfall, Ellsworth Airport, Cheyenne Bottoms, Silica, Kanopolis Lake, Kanopolis State Park and Odin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
